group.description: Group to consume Kafka messages from

Output.Description: Kafka message as a NIO signal.

Miscellaneous.Starting servers::
bin/zookeeper-server-start.sh config/zookeeper.properties
bin/kafka-server-start.sh config/server.properties
**Important** In order for topics to be created automatically, Kafka server needs to be
configured with setting 'auto.create.topics.enable' set to true.
see: https://kafka.apache.org/08/configuration.html

nio/KafkaBase.Description:
Defines common functionality to Kafka blocks.
Kafka blocks require running Kafka and Zookeeper servers
see: http://kafka.apache.org/documentation.html#quickstart

Input.Description: Kafka message sent from a KafkaBatchProducer.

Miscellaneous.Starting servers::
bin/zookeeper-server-start.sh config/zookeeper.properties
bin/kafka-server-start.sh config/server.properties
**Important** In order for topics to be created automatically, Kafka server needs to be
configured with setting 'auto.create.topics.enable' set to true.
see: https://kafka.apache.org/08/configuration.html

nio/KafkaBatchConsumer.Description: Consumes Kafka messages sent from a KafkaBatchProducer block

group.description: Group to consume Kafka messages from

msg_buffer_size.description: maximum length of buffer used to capture signals, this value cannot be smaller than size of all signals sent from KafkaBatchProducer

nio/KafkaBatchProducer.Description:
A block that receives signals and sends them to Kafka server. This blocks
uses Kafka infrastructure to send signals, in order to receive signals
successfully receiving block must be of type KafkaBatchConsumer

Output.Description:
Kafka message as a NIO signal.
KafkaBatchProducer

nio/KafkaProducer.Description: A block that receives signals and sends them to Kafka server.
